00005 StoredImageSkyColourModel::StoredImageSkyColourModel () {
00006   mFogColourMap = 0;
00007   mFogDensity = 0.0005;
00008 }

00010 void StoredImageSkyColourModel::setSkyGradientsImage (const Ogre::String &gradients) {
00011   if (mSkyGradientsTextureUnitState) {
00012     // Dagon and Eihort compatibility
00013     #if OGRE_VERSION < 0x130
00014       mSkyGradientsTextureUnitState->setTextureName (gradients, Ogre::TEX_TYPE_2D, -1, true);
00015     #else
00016       mSkyGradientsTextureUnitState->setTextureName (gradients, Ogre::TEX_TYPE_2D);
00017       mSkyGradientsTextureUnitState->setIsAlpha (true);
00018     #endif      
00019   }
00020 
00021   setFogColoursImage (gradients);
00022 }
00023 
00024 Ogre::ColourValue StoredImageSkyColourModel::getFogColour (float time) {
00025   if (mFogColourMap == 0) {
00026     return Ogre::ColourValue::White;
00027   }
00028   else {
00029     return getInterpolatedColour (time, 1, mFogColourMap);
00030   }
00031 }
00032 
00033 float StoredImageSkyColourModel::getFogDensity (float time) {
00034   if (mFogColourMap == 0) {
00035     return mFogDensity;
00036   }
00037   else {
00038     return mFogDensity * (getInterpolatedColour (time, 1, mFogColourMap)).a;
00039   }
00040 }
00041 
00042 void StoredImageSkyColourModel::setFogDensity (float density) {
00043   mFogDensity = density;
00044 }
00045 
00046 void StoredImageSkyColourModel::setFogColoursImage (const Ogre::String &name) {
00047   if (mFogColourMap == 0)
00048     mFogColourMap = new Ogre::Image ();
00049 
00050   mFogColourMap->load (name, "Caelum");
00051 }
00052 
00053 Ogre::ColourValue StoredImageSkyColourModel::getInterpolatedColour (float x, float height, Ogre::Image *img) {
00054   // calculate the height
00055   int y = (int )(img->getHeight () * height);
00056   if (y >= img->getHeight ())
00057     y--;
00058 
00059   // Get the two closest pixels
00060   int curPix, auxPix;
00061   float diff;
00062   curPix = (int )(img->getWidth () * x);
00063   diff = img->getWidth () * x - curPix;
00064   if (diff < 0) {
00065     auxPix = curPix - 1;
00066   }
00067   else {
00068     auxPix = curPix + 1;
00069   }
00070 
00071   // Calculate the interpolated pixel
00072   Ogre::ColourValue c1, c2, cf;
00073   c1 = img->getColourAt (curPix % img->getWidth (), y, 0);
00074   c2 = img->getColourAt (auxPix % img->getWidth (), y, 0);
00075   cf = c1 * (1 - diff) + c2 * diff;
00076 
00077   return cf;
00078 }
